#summary Tellurium Contributor List
#labels Phase-Support

Tellurium Contributors are categorized into development team, support team, evangelism team, and users. Former team members are also listed here.


== Development Team ==

  * *Jian Fang*: Jian graduated from Georgia Institue of Technology with a Ph.D. degree. He works as a senior software engineer in a company and mainly focuses on architecting, desigining, and implementing enterprise applications. He is both a researcher and a developer. He is the Tellurium project owner and the principal developer.
